io.reinert.requestor.serialization.json

Class JsonValueSerdes<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.reinert.requestor.serialization.json.JsonSerdes<T>
      • io.reinert.requestor.serialization.json.JsonValueSerdes<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the object to serialize/deserialize
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deserializer<T>, Serdes<T>, Serializer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    JsonBooleanSerdes, JsonNumberSerdes, JsonStringSerdes

    public abstract class JsonValueSerdes<T>
extends JsonSerdes<T>
    Base class for all SerDes that manipulates serialized JSON simple values.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Detail

      • deserialize

        public <C extends Collection<T>> C deserialize(Class<C> collectionType,
                                      String response,
                                      DeserializationContext context)
        Description copied from interface: Deserializer
        Deserialize the plain text into a collection T.

        The collection instance can be retrieved from its Provider, obtained in ProviderManager.get(java.lang.Class<T>).
        The ContainerFactoryManager can be retrieved from DeserializationContext.getInstance(Class).

        Parameters:
        collectionType - The class of the collection
        response - Http response body content
        context - Context of deserialization
        Returns:
        The object deserialized
